MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The ki-rin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The ki-rin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: gaseous form, major image (6th-level version), wind walk
1/day: create food and water

MonsterTrait.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin’s weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The ki-rin is a 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good, sanctuary
2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, lesser restoration, silence
3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, remove curse, sending
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith
5th level (3 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, scrying
6th level (1 slot): heroes’ feast, true seeing
7th level (1 slot): etherealness, plane shift
8th level (1 slot): control weather
9th level (1 slot): true resurrection

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin makes three attacks: two with its hooves and one with its horn.

MonsterAction.Name: Hoof
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft, one target. Hit: 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Horn
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The ki-rin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Detect
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin makes a Wisdom (Perception) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check.

MonsterTrait.Name: Smite
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin makes a hoof attack or casts sacred flame.

MonsterTrait.Name: Move
MonsterTrait.Text: The ki-rin moves up to its half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
